stripped_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. Whenever an agenda is accessed or scored, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. While the Runner is accessing an agenda in R&D, they must reveal it. Whenever an agenda is accessed or scored, Trace[3]. If successful, do 1 core damage.
title: Kill Switch
